exceptions.exn: In environment plus_cancel_l' := plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c n : nat f : nat -> nat i : nat H : i < n Unable to unify "∑ ?M1442 ?M1443 <= ∑ ?M1442 ?M1444" with "f i <= ∑ n f".
In environment plus_cancel_l' := plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c n : nat f : nat -> nat i : nat H : i < n Unable to unify "i < n" with "f i <= f i".

original: intros. intros H. apply sum_0n_mono. intros i Hi. apply le_trans with (f i). apply H. apply le_refl.
